verses.text: I \add am\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that\add* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* by the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.
He hath \w led|strong="H5090"\w* me, and \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \add me into\add* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, but not \add into\add* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.
Surely against me is he \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*; he \w turneth|strong="H2015"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add against me\add* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
My \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and my \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* hath he made \w old|strong="H1086"\w*; he hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.
He hath builded \w against|strong="H1129"\w* me, and \w compassed|strong="H5362"\w* \add me\add* with \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* and \w travail|strong="H8513"\w*.
He hath \w set|strong="H3427"\w* me in dark \w places|strong="H4285"\w*, as \add they that be\add* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*.
He hath \w hedged|strong="H1443"\w* me about, that I cannot get \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: he hath made my \w chain|strong="H5178"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*.
Also when I \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* and \w shout|strong="H7768"\w*, he shutteth \w out|strong="H5640"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.
He hath \w inclosed|strong="H1443"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* with hewn \w stone|strong="H1496"\w*, he hath made my \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w crooked|strong="H5753"\w*.
He \add was\add* unto me \add as\add* a \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* lying in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, \add and as\add* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* in secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w*.
He hath turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and pulled me in \w pieces|strong="H6582"\w*: he hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* me \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*.
He hath \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* his \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5324"\w* me as a \w mark|strong="H4307"\w* for the \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w*.
He hath caused the \w arrows|strong="H1121"\w* of his \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w reins|strong="H3629"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft arrows: Heb. sons\f*
I was a \w derision|strong="H7814"\w* to all my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \add and\add* their \w song|strong="H5058"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

He hath \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* me with \w bitterness|strong="H4844"\w*, he hath made me \w drunken|strong="H7301"\w* with \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft bitterness: Heb. bitternesses\f*

He hath also \w broken|strong="H1638"\w* my \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* with gravel \w stones|strong="H2687"\w*, he hath \w covered|strong="H3728"\w* me with \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft covered…: or, rolled me in the ashes\f*

And thou hast \w removed|strong="H2186"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* far \w off|strong="H2186"\w* from \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: I \w forgat|strong="H5382"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft prosperity: Heb. good\f*
And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w strength|strong="H5331"\w* and my \w hope|strong="H8431"\w* is \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

\w Remembering|strong="H2142"\w* mine \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* and my \w misery|strong="H4788"\w*, the \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w* and the \w gall|strong="H7219"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft Remembering: or, Remember\f*
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \add them\add* \w still|strong="H2142"\w* in \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*, and is \w humbled|strong="H7743"\w* in me.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft humbled: Heb. bowed\f*
This I \w recall|strong="H7725"\w* to my \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, therefore have I \w hope|strong="H3176"\w*.\f + \fr 3.21 \ft recall…: Heb. make to return to my heart\f*

¶ \add It is of\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* that we are not \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, because his \w compassions|strong="H7356"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* not.
\add They are\add* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \add is\add* thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; therefore will I \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in him.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto them that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for him, to the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add that\add* \w seeketh|strong="H1875"\w* him.

\add It is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that \add a man\add* should both \w hope|strong="H3175"\w* and quietly \w wait|strong="H1748"\w* for the \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
\add It is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that he \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* in his \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.
He \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w* and keepeth \w silence|strong="H1826"\w*, because he hath \w borne|strong="H5190"\w* \add it\add* upon him.
He \w putteth|strong="H5414"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*; if so be there may \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*.
He \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \add his\add* \w cheek|strong="H3895"\w* to him that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* him: he is filled \w full|strong="H7646"\w* with \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.
For the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* will not cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
But though he cause \w grief|strong="H3013"\w*, yet will he have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w*.

For he doth not \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w willingly|strong="H3820"\w* nor \w grieve|strong="H3013"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 3.33 \ft willingly: Heb. from his heart\f*
To \w crush|strong="H1792"\w* under his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* all the \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*,

To turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* before the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*,\f + \fr 3.35 \ft the most High: or, a superior\f*

To \w subvert|strong="H5791"\w* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* in his \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w approveth|strong="H7200"\w* not.\f + \fr 3.36 \ft approveth not: or, seeth not\f*
¶ Who \add is\add* he \add that\add* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, and it cometh to pass, \add when\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w commandeth|strong="H6680"\w* \add it\add* not?
Out of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w proceedeth|strong="H3318"\w* not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* and \w good|strong="H2896"\w*?

Wherefore doth a \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w complain|strong="H0596"\w*, a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* for the punishment of his \w sins|strong="H2399"\w*?\f + \fr 3.39 \ft complain: or, murmur\f*
Let us \w search|strong="H2664"\w* and \w try|strong="H2713"\w* our \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Let us lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* our \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* with \add our\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0410"\w* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.
\w We|strong="H5168"\w* have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* and have \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w*: thou hast not \w pardoned|strong="H5545"\w*.
Thou hast \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* with \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w persecuted|strong="H7291"\w* us: thou hast \w slain|strong="H2026"\w*, thou hast not \w pitied|strong="H2550"\w*.
Thou hast \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* thyself with a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, that \add our\add* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* should not pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*.
Thou hast \w made|strong="H7760"\w* us \add as\add* the \w offscouring|strong="H5501"\w* and \w refuse|strong="H3973"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
All our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* have \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* against us.
\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w* and a \w snare|strong="H6354"\w* is come upon us, \w desolation|strong="H7612"\w* and \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* runneth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with \w rivers|strong="H6388"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* trickleth \w down|strong="H5064"\w*, and \w ceaseth|strong="H1820"\w* not, without any \w intermission|strong="H2014"\w*,
Till the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* look \w down|strong="H8259"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w affecteth|strong="H5953"\w* mine \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* because of all the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 3.51 \ft mine heart: Heb. my soul\f*\f + \fr 3.51 \ft because…: or, more than all\f*
Mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w chased|strong="H6679"\w* me \w sore|strong="H6679"\w*, like a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.
They have cut \w off|strong="H6789"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* in the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H3034"\w* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* upon me.
\w Waters|strong="H4325"\w* flowed \w over|strong="H6687"\w* mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; \add then\add* I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I am cut \w off|strong="H1504"\w*.
¶ I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, out of the \w low|strong="H8482"\w* \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*.
Thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* not thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* at my \w breathing|strong="H7309"\w*, at my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w*.
Thou drewest \w near|strong="H7126"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon thee: thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not.

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, thou hast \w pleaded|strong="H7378"\w* the \w causes|strong="H7379"\w* of my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.
O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* my \w wrong|strong="H5792"\w*: \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thou my \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*.
Thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all their \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \add and\add* all their \w imaginations|strong="H4284"\w* against me.
Thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* their \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* all their \w imaginations|strong="H4284"\w* against me;
The \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of those that rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me, and their \w device|strong="H1902"\w* against me all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Behold|strong="H5027"\w* their sitting \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, and their rising \w up|strong="H7012"\w*; I \add am\add* their \w musick|strong="H4485"\w*.
¶ \w Render|strong="H7725"\w* unto them a \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according to the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.
\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w sorrow|strong="H4044"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, thy \w curse|strong="H8381"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 3.65 \ft sorrow…: or, obstinacy of heart\f*
\w Persecute|strong="H7291"\w* and \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* them in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* from under the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
